comments.content:
Superb collection so far - some amazing gems.   
   
But nothing touches 05.005 ... nothing.   
And the back just amplifies the whole bigtime.   
   
Will we eventually find out who did which?   
   
hhp
maybe he's still learning and didn't know about that? ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050824113315im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

neat stuff on this day. I agree with Hrant. No. 5 seems to be an early front-runner with No. 1 bringing up the rear. ![:)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050824113315im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
